title: Play and communication with 1-2 year toddlers!
content:
DID YOU KNOW? 

- If toddlers are healthy and well nourished, they become more active.

- Toddlers learn to understand words and begin to speak. 

- Toddlers enjoy playing with simple things from the household or from nature, and do not need store-bought toys.

- Ones like to turn pages as they look at books. They are also able to point at familiar objects as you name familiar pictures.

- Toddlers need encouragement as they try to walk, play new games, and learn new skills.

- When Toddlers learn a new game or skill, they repeat it over and over again.

- Infants like to put things into cans and boxes, and then take them out.

- Infants are especially happy when they see that they are making the adults around them happy, too.
